content: The @Target meta-annotation determines what may be marked by the annotation. The value attribute is one or more of the java.lang.annotation.ElementType enum constants. Those constants are ElementType.ANNOTATION_TYPE, CONSTRUCTOR, FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD, PACKAGE, PARAMETER, and TYPE.
